LightningComponentBundle.description: Conversational component that invokes the flow "Invoke_Agentforce_For_Agentic_Next_Best_Actions" to surface next best actions.

property.name: initialRequest
property.label: Initial Request
property.description: An initial request to send automatically on load.

property.name: sendEndUserConversation
property.label: Send End User Conversation
property.description: If true, sends messages from the end-user (customer) to the flow.

property.name: sendAgentConversation
property.label: Send Representative Conversation
property.description: If true, sends messages from the agent to the flow.

property.name: flowApiName
property.label: Flow API Name
property.description: API name of the autolaunched Flow to invoke. Defaults to the packaged flow.
